long_description: This Thule Universal Snowboard carrier features a clamping designthat allows it to mount to factory racks, Thule, Yakima and Barrecrafters. Two-board, angled design allows more room for a Thule box or ski carrier. Snowboards lock to carrier with included locks and carrier secures to bar using theft-resistant hardware. Adjustable for different board widths. Cable lock is covered with nylon to prevent damage to board. Thule car top rack sold separately.
short_description: This Thule Universal Snowboard carrier features a clamping designthat allows it to mount to factory racks, Thule, Yakima and Barrecrafters.
